projectGridLines.title: 5 projects
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1 Title: Enhancing Growth


Description: Develop and optimize sales funnels, support product development,

and foster collaboration for B2B2C growth in cybersecurity solutions.

Skill sets: Sales funnel optimization, product development, project management,

and collaborative skills.

Traits expectation:Innovative, analytical, team player, and results-driven.

Expected learning: Product management, growth marketing and digital analytics.

Specific courses required for project execution: None


Project 2 Title: Cybersecurity Supplier partnership


Description: Partner with leading cybersecurity service provider who specialize in

email, network , cloud security, etc. These partners will cater to our clients

requirements. We will receive revenue share for selling their products to our

clients.

Skill sets: Business communication (oral+written), cross functional team

collaboration, lead generation, Presentation, MS Office

Traits expectation: Relationship building skills, eye for details, negotiation,

prioritization of tasks, high morale and ethics

Expected learning: To drive business results via running partner programs

Specific courses required for project execution: None


Project 3 Title: Enhancing B2C Growth


Description: Optimize marketing strategies, improve customer acquisition, and

boost engagement for B2C growth in cybersecurity solutions.

Skill sets: Digital marketing, customer acquisition, data analysis, and project

management.

Traits expectation: Creative, analytical, proactive, and customer-focused.

Expected learning: Advanced marketing techniques, customer engagement

strategies, and data-driven decision making.

Specific courses required for project execution: Digital marketing, customer

acquisition strategies, and data analytics.

Project 4 Title: B2B Sales Intern for Cybersecurity Insurance


Description: Assist in generating leads, conducting market research, and

supporting sales strategies for Mitigata's cybersecurity insurance.

Skill sets: Strong communication, market research, CRM proficiency (HubSpot

preferred), and basic understanding of cybersecurity.

Traits expectation: Proactive, detail-oriented, adaptable, and eager to learn.

Expected learning: Insight into B2B sales processes, understanding of

cybersecurity market dynamics, and hands-on experience with CRM tools.

Specific courses required for project execution: Basic awareness in cybersecurity,

sales strategy and techniques, and CRM software training (HubSpot preferred).


Project 5 Title: Cyber Insurance Distribution partnership


Description: Partner with leading insurance brokers, ecosystem enablers,

distributors who will sell our cyber insurance products to their clients. These

partners will be our external sales arm and channel partner. We will give revenue

share to these partners for selling our cyber insurance products.

Skill sets: Business communication (oral+written), cross functional team

collaboration, lead generation, Presentation, MS Office

Traits expectation: Relationship building skills, eye for details, negotiation,

prioritization of tasks, high morale and ethics

Expected learning: To drive business results via running partner programs

Specific courses required for project execution: None
